# RoleFlags enumeration

Represents [Role Flags](https://discord.com/developers/docs/topics/permissions#role-flags)

| --- | --- | --- |
| None | `0` | No Role Flags |
| InPrompt | `1 << 0` | Role can be selected by members in an onboarding |
